'''Chapter II''' is the [[Archon Quest]] chapter set in the nation of [[Inazuma]].

{{Quote|In the secluded land of the immortal Shogun, the Bakufu rules eternal. But what do mortals see of the eternity chased after by their god?|[[Dainsleif]]|[[Teyvat Chapter Storyline Preview: Travail|Teyvat Chapter Storyline Preview]]<ref>YouTube: [https://youtu.be/TAlKhARUcoY Teyvat Chapter Storyline Preview]</ref>}}

==List of Acts==
* Prologue - [[Autumn Winds, Scarlet Leaves]]
** Requirements: {{Quest|30;We Will Be Reunited|requirements=1}}.
* Act I - [[The Immovable God and the Eternal Euthymia]]
** Requirements: {{Quest|30|requirements=1}}.
* Act II - [[Stillness, the Sublimation of Shadow]]
** Requirements: {{Quest|30;The Whispers of the Crane and the White Rabbit;Dreamlike Timelessness|display=bullet|requirements=1}}
* Act III - [[Omnipresence Over Mortals]]
** Requirements: {{Quest|30|requirements=1}}.
* Act IV - [[Requiem of the Echoing Depths]]
** Requirements: {{Quest|30|requirements=1}}
